1.title: Episode #4.1

episode of.title: Varsity Voice Presented by SFBN (TV Series 2015– )

1.plot: Varsity Voice is BACK. Host Ari Bluestein is joined by Aaron "Ace" Carter of the Philadelphia Inquirer, as the duo recap some of the top Philadelphia area high school football games from last week and look ahead to the top match-ups coming up this week. In addition, Ari is joined by Merion Mercy Academy field hockey players - junior Margo Carlin and senior Caitlin Farkas. Margo and Caitlin talk about their season thus far, their goals to win the state championship, and their decisions to play field hockey in college.

20.title: Episode #2.20

episode of.title: Varsity Voice Presented by SFBN (TV Series 2015– )

20.plot: "The Day In The Life Of A Student Athlete" Betsy Prezioso and Jimmy McAfee of Germantown Academy are featured and take us through a typical school day. They go to classes, study, hang with friends and compete on the lacrosse field. Its truly a detailed look at what it's like to be a good student athlete during the high school years.

7.title: Episode #3.7

CB West at Souderton and Germantown Academy at Malvern Prep (both on SFBN) and Downingtown East vs. Downingtown West. Act Two: In this weeks feature, we head to Boathouse Row in Center City Philadelphia to learn more about Philadelphia City Rowing (PCR). Act Three: Ari and Kieran McCauley break down the battle for Downingtown. Plus Predictions and The Highlight of the Week.

Act Three: Mike is joined by the duo from Game On and Calkins Media - Drew Markol and Jen Wielgus - to break down what's going on in the PIAA District 1 6A and 5A brackets, and preview the District 1 6A semi-final games.
